[30;1m30 | [0m[35mNewer devices that respond on port 20002 will require TP-Link cloud credentials to be passed (unless[0m
[30;1m31 | [0m[35mto the TP-Link cloud) or they will report as having failed authentication when trying to query the d[0m

[30;1m33 | [0m[35mThese values can also be set as environment variables via ``KASA_USERNAME`` and ``KASA_PASSWORD``.[0m
[30;1m34 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m35 | [0m[35mOn multihomed systems, you can use ``--target`` option to specify the broadcast target.[0m

[30;1m10 | [0m[35mNote that the ``--type`` parameter only works for legacy devices using port 9999.[0m

[30;1m17 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m18 | [0m[35mYou can use {attr}`~Device.on_since` to query for the time the device has been turned on.[0m
[30;1m19 | [0m[35mSome devices also support reporting the usage statistics on daily or monthly basis.[0m
[30;1m20 | [0m[35mYou can access this information using through the usage module ({class}`kasa.modules.Usage`):[0m
[30;1m21 | [0m[35m[0m

[30;1m1994 | [0m[35m[0m

[30;1m88 | [0m[35mYou can use :attr:`~SmartDevice.on_since` to query for the time the device has been turned on.[0m
[30;1m89 | [0m[35mSome devices also support reporting the usage statistics on daily or monthly basis.[0m
[30;1m90 | [0m[35mYou can access this information using through the usage module (:class:`kasa.modules.Usage`):[0m
[30;1m91 | [0m[35m[0m
